description: Shek Marsook alias Chutta Vs Hon. Attorney General before HON. WICKUM A. KALUARACHCHI, J
parties: Shek Marsook alias Chutta Vs Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Proof beyond reasonable doubt. Analysing the alibi. Identification of the dead body. Proving the identity of the accused with the aid of circumstantial evidence.
legistation: Sections 296 and 300 of the Penal Code. Section 126 A (1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act.
